title: Studies and Sociologists to use for the Families & Households topic (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, Matthew talks through some key studies that are useful for the families and household topic on issues such as childhood, family diversity, affairs in marriage and changes in solo living.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew talks through some key studies that are useful for the families and household topic on issues such as childhood, family diversity, affairs in marriage and changes in solo living.
